<a id="MethodTweener"></a>

# MethodTweener

**Inherits:** [Tweener](Tweener.md) **\<** [RefCounted](RefCounted.md) **\<** [Object](Object.md)

Interpolates an abstract value and supplies it to a method called over time.

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Description

**MethodTweener** is similar to a combination of [CallbackTweener](CallbackTweener.md) and [PropertyTweener](PropertyTweener.md). It calls a method providing an interpolated value as a parameter. See [Tween.tween_method()](Tween.md#Tween_method_tween_method) for more usage information.

The tweener will finish automatically if the callback's target object is freed.

\ **Note:** [Tween.tween_method()](Tween.md#Tween_method_tween_method) is the only correct way to create **MethodTweener**. Any **MethodTweener** created manually will not function correctly.

<!-- classref-descriptions-group -->

## Method Descriptions

<a id="MethodTweener_method_set_delay"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[MethodTweener](MethodTweener.md) **set_delay**\ (\ delay\: [float](float.md)\ ) [ðŸ”—](#MethodTweener_method_set_delay)

Sets the time in seconds after which the **MethodTweener** will start interpolating. By default there's no delay.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="MethodTweener_method_set_ease"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[MethodTweener](MethodTweener.md) **set_ease**\ (\ ease\: [EaseType](Tween.md#enum_Tween_EaseType)\ ) [ðŸ”—](#MethodTweener_method_set_ease)

Sets the type of used easing from [EaseType](Tween.md#enum_Tween_EaseType). If not set, the default easing is used from the [Tween](Tween.md) that contains this Tweener.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="MethodTweener_method_set_trans"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[MethodTweener](MethodTweener.md) **set_trans**\ (\ trans\: [TransitionType](Tween.md#enum_Tween_TransitionType)\ ) [ðŸ”—](#MethodTweener_method_set_trans)

Sets the type of used transition from [TransitionType](Tween.md#enum_Tween_TransitionType). If not set, the default transition is used from the [Tween](Tween.md) that contains this Tweener.
